name: Pristine
description:
Pristine is a 360-degree experience with an environmental purpose.

The player is presented with beautiful 360-degree panoramas that contain plastic garbage. The player is encouraged to pick the garbage up and then spend some time enjoying the pristine beauty of the place. The idea is to not just view the 360-degree panorama, but to interact with it, develop a connection with it, and experience it fully.

All you need is a browser running on a desktop or a mobile or, for the best experience, a VR device.

Plastic pollution is a serious worldwide problem. Educating the public about it, and helping them modify their behavior are important steps towards mitigating this problem.

Make our world pristine again!
